channel.title: How many times have you beaten Half-Life Games (waiting for episode 3)
channel.description: i have beaten Half-Life 1 two times, Half-Life 2, 7 times, Half-Life episode 1, one time, episode 2, 1 time, Half-Life: opposing force 3 times, blue shift twice.............ican go on forever with all of the valve games
